response.original_title: Matt Kayes Lake Escapes - Game Fishing and Deep Sea Fishing
response.overview: In this fascinating episode, Matt takes us on a helicopter tour around the picturesque peaks of Lapland, where we experience the thrills of mayfly-fishing for brown troat, fly-fishing for pike, and nymph-fishing for char. We then travel to Norway where Matt struggles to find the elusive salmon and works hard to improve his new techniques. We join him in West Wales for a spot of sea trout fishing on the River Towy, including some brave night-time ventures. Finally he heads to Ireland, where he catches some fine specimens of brown troat. Surrounded by such a diverse and wonderful range of beautiful landscapes, Matt feels utterly at one with nature - and his amazing catches are a bonus!
response.title: Matt Kayes Lake Escapes - Game Fishing and Deep Sea Fishing
